fields.name: LocalIPAddress
fields.description: Local IP Address to be filtered on. Notation: "127.0.0.1" for single address entry. "127.0.0.1-127.0.0.255" for range. "127.0.0.1;127.0.0.5"? for multiple entries. Multiple ranges not currently supported. Mixing ranges with multiple entries not currently supported. Default = null.

fields.name: LocalPort
fields.description: Local port to be filtered on. Notation: "80" for single port entry."80-85" for range. "80;443;" for multiple entries. Multiple ranges not currently supported. Mixing ranges with multiple entries not currently supported. Default = null.

fields.name: RemoteIPAddress
fields.description: Local IP Address to be filtered on. Notation: "127.0.0.1" for single address entry. "127.0.0.1-127.0.0.255" for range. "127.0.0.1;127.0.0.5;" for multiple entries. Multiple ranges not currently supported. Mixing ranges with multiple entries not currently supported. Default = null.

fields.name: RemotePort
fields.description: Remote port to be filtered on. Notation: "80" for single port entry."80-85" for range. "80;443;" for multiple entries. Multiple ranges not currently supported. Mixing ranges with multiple entries not currently supported. Default = null.
